review: So glad I got google chrome. Easy to set up and use. Now I can easily stream from my desktop, laptop and phone to the big screen TV within seconds.

review: Chromecast is an amazing casting only device. I've since moved to all Roku 3's in the house for the native app support. But if you want something that's strictly casting and is cheap, you can't go wrong.
author: Julez

review: It is google, what can I say. Be soure you have a good router signal tho. It can be picky if it is too far away from it.
